This is a strategy game with the mouse control.
Enter the game, click on the arrow.
Click on the card, and then click on the ground, people will appear.
Click on food increased energy, use energy create soldiers.

Take a long time, finally put the game.
Feel relieved.

If you have any advice for the game, also can add QQ group, improve the game together.
